DataElement.preferredName: Ophthalmic Examinations Domain Right Eye Corrected Visual Acuity Normal Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether or not the patient's corrected visual acuity in the right eye is normal for his/her age.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ophthalmic Examinations Domain Right Eye Corrected Visual Acuity Normal
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to ophthalmic examinations._The eye positioned in the right orbit._Having had errors or mistakes removed._Sharpness of vision, the ability to discern fine detail._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
